ocr-interpreted-text.ocr-interpreted-line: "After long and earnest consideration, Her Majesty's Government have come to the
conclusion that it would be right for Britain to make a formal application.. for ne-
gotiations with a view to joining the Community." At this point, Mr. Paul WVilliams
(Cons., Sunderland) called out "Shame. " Mr. Williams is a close associate of M.
